column1: Little Goat Diner////I absolutely love the West Loop and all it has to offer. Little Goat especially has a casual feel and more affordable meals
column2: but is worth every penny. While I am sure all of the menu items are delicious
column3: I simply cannot go there without ordering the fish tostadas. They have amazing flavor and are filling. My husband
column4: who prefers meat on the average day
column5: usually regrets not ordering the fish tostadas and has now jumped on my bandwagon. In general I think that Little Goat is a great place to take visitors in Chicago because it is in a cool area but is more affordable and has great options.
